Summary: Mentors and Mentees are expected to conduct a minimum of 6 tech & non-tech sessions with at least 3 in-person sessions . Mentors will be assigned to mentors based on their background and interest

Mentors and Mentees are expected to conduct a minimum of 6 tech & non-tech sessions with at least 3 in-person sessions . Mentors will be assigned to mentors based on their background and interest as indicated on the registration form .
